lead_paragraph: Leslie Uggams is performing classic jazz and doo-wop in “Uptown Downtown” at the Cafe Carlyle, her first New York cabaret show in 18 years.
snippet: Leslie Uggams is performing classic jazz and doo-wop in “Uptown Downtown” at the Cafe Carlyle, her first New York cabaret show in 18 years.

headline.main: A Trouper’s Journey From the Apollo to Broadway
headline.seo: Leslie Uggams, Show-Biz Trouper  at Cafe Carlyle
